title: Definitions
context: [ยง21D-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context requires otherwise: &ldquo;ACCESS/legislative information services&rdquo; means the information service provided by the legislature through on-line information networks; including, without limitation, HAWIAN. &ldquo;HAWIAN&rdquo; means the Hawaii area-wide information network. &ldquo;On-line&rdquo; means accessed by the use of data communications hardware and software. [L 1990, c 348, pt of ยง1]
